page.title: 02LUDLOW FESTIVAL
page.content: Apart from the Shakespeare play,the official events in the 1985 Festival were : An Orchestral Concert and a Chamber Concert in St Lawrences' Church ; a concert performance of a Donivetti opera at Oakley Park ; brass band concerts in Castle Square ; a folk concert ; a Jazz and Blues band ; a verse autobiography of John Betjeman ; a Film Festival with four major films ; an art exhibition ; a lecture by the World Landspeed Record Holder ; a lecture on the Industrial Revolution in Shropshire ; a cookery demonstration by an international chef ; a drama production based on 19th century diaries ; guided historical tours of the town. For Children there was a 'Fun with Art' demonstration and a puppet show/workshop.
